partners.title: Cancer Center
descriptions: AI platform for radiology and pathology diagnostics, focused on prostate imaging.

"We strive to provide physicians around the world with state-of-the-art tools to support them in the process of detecting and classifying malignancies. Our AI is trained using multiple modalities, providing comprehensive assistance in the cancer diagnosis process."
